trait.name: Swarm
entries: A Vee'gn'och can act as a swarm (composed of smaller elements), or it can grant a single member (called an exarch) control, acting as a singular creature. Changing between forms takes one action. In its singular form, the collective can't occupy the same space as another creature, but it can perform sneak attacks and cast spells. In swarm form, the Vee'gn'och can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and it can move through openings at least 1 foot square. It can't change to singular form while it occupies the same space as another creature. It uses its skills normally in either form.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When Vee'gn'och reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, Vee'gn'och can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Vee'gn'och makes two claw attacks, or one claw and one bite attack, or one swarm attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 14} Constitution save or suffer the effects of Wyrmblood Venom.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Swarm
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d12 + 4}) piercing damage, or 17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) piercing damage if the Vee'gn'och has half its hit points or fewer. If the attack hits, the target must make a successful {@dc 13} Constitution save or suffer the effects of Wyrmblood Venom.

action.name: Sudden Rush.
entries: Until the end of the turn, Vee'gn'och's speed increases by 60 feet and it doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

action.name: Incite Rampage {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature the Vee'gn'och can see within 30 feet of it can use its reaction to make a melee attack if it can hear the Vee'gn'och and has the Rampage trait.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Vee'gn'och's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

1: {@spell animate dead} (up to 5 skeletons or zombies)
